DOC.brief_summary: Objective : We aim evaluate long term efficacy safety AG add-on therapy patient type 2 diabetes control conventional treatment . Materials Methods : A total 23 type 2 patient enrol study . Utilizing double-blind , crossover design , participant randomize receive either placebo American ginseng extract ( AG ) 1g/meal=3g/day 8-week , maintain conventional diabetes treatment . Following ≥4-week washout period participant cross another 8-week treatment arm . Throughout study period , individual maintain original diabetes treatment regular lifestyle . The primary endpoint HbA1c , secondary fasting blood glucose insulin , blood pressure , serum nitrates/nitrites ( NOx ) PAI-1 . Safety parameter include liver , kidney hemostatic function .
